channel.title: Wisdoms on Dixit Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Wisdoms on Dixit Patel

item.title: Quotes
item.description: I often come across inspirational content/quotes on various blog posts, HackerNews, reddit etc that I keep stockpiling into my Evernote. Below are tidbits from this diary of growing wisdom. The lessons and learning come hard, sometimes hitting home with as much recklessness as Roy Keane’s tackles on field hah! Hope you like them! Bill Gates The best way to prepare as a programmer is to write programs, and to study great programs that other people have written.
